text: Sarupane wong kang wis didhawuhi ngistokake Taurat wusana banjur ora gelem (banjur nerusake manut marang nabi Muhamad SAW). Iku upamanane kaya Himar (jalaran cilik bodho) gawa kitab - kitab gedhe. Hala temen sarupane wong kang padha maido ayating Allah, Allah ora kersa paring pituduh bener marang wong kafir
